author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s.com: Extra 30% Off Baby Items + 15% Off $100 Purchase = 41 Carter’s Items $2.08 Each Shipped
text:
Kohl’s Shoppers! Today ONLY, Kohl’s.com is offering up an additional 30% off select Baby & Toddler Clothing, Shoes and Baby Gear with promo code BABY30 at checkout! Plus, through January 22nd, they are having a huge online Baby Sale and you can save BIG on name-brand baby clothing, gear and much more!
Even sweeter, if you’re wanting to stock up on baby items, you can stack the code BABY30 with promo code CATCH15OFF for an additional 15% off your $100+ purchase (applies after the 30% code)!
Standard shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $5.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pickup if available at a store near you.

Want to Stock Up? Do This and Save BIG! Buy 4 Baby Carter’s Bodysuit & Pants 3pc Sets – Baby Boys or Baby Girls $11 (reg. $22) 
Buy 3 Baby Carter’s 5pk Bodysuits $13 (reg. $26) 
Buy 2 Baby Carter’s Animal Hooded Towels $12 (reg. $24) 
Buy 3 Baby Carter’s Bibs 4pks or Burp Cloths 4pks $12 (reg. $24) 
Total = $143
Use promo code BABY30 for 30% off select baby and toddler clothing, shoes and baby gear – TODAY ONLY 
Use promo code CATCH15OFF for 15% off $100+ purchase
Final cost $85.08 shipped for 41 Carter’s items – just $2.08 each!
More Great Deals on Carter’s Baby Items… 
Baby Carter’s Animal Hooded Towel $12 (reg. $24) 
Use promo code BABY30 for 30% off select baby and toddler clothing, shoes and baby gear – TODAY ONLY 
Final cost just $8.40!

Final cost only $9.10 – just $1.82 per bodysuit!

Use promo code BABY30 for 30% off select baby and toddler clothing, shoes and baby gear – TODAY ONLY 
Final cost only $7.70!

Baby Carter’s Bibs 4pk or Burp Cloths 4pk $12 (reg. $24) 
Use promo code BABY30 for 30% off select baby and toddler clothing, shoes and baby gear – TODAY ONLY 
Final cost only $8.40 – just $2.10 per bib or burp cloth!
